'''Eric George Fraser''' ([[11 June|June 11]], [[1902]] â€“ [[15 November|November 15]], [[1983]]) was a British illustrator and graphic artist.

A specialist in illustrating classic scenes from mythology (such as [[Beowulf (poem)|Beowulf]] fighting the dragon) and classic medieval scenes, Fraser also illustrated [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s books, such as the Folio Society edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' in 1977 and the Folio Society edition of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' in 1979.<ref>''[[The Annotated Hobbit: Revised and Expanded Edition]]''</ref>
